name: Me, Myself & Witch
description:
Hey! This is my submission to the Cozy Autumn 2022 game jam

This game is about a witch that's obsessed with herself. You get to do Autumn activities with her:)

I hope you have a blast! If you do, I would love  to see screenshots of your end results! You can put them in the comments or DM me on Instagram (@melpgames)

Thanks for playing<3
